body_html:
Yes, I've installed only through conda (both 0.4.1 and 1.0.0.dev20181113 in different environments).

Below are my MKL versions according to conda for the nightly environment:

$ conda list | grep pytorch
pytorch-nightly           1.0.0.dev20181113 py3.6_cuda9.0.176_cudnn7.1.2_0    pytorch

$ conda list | grep -i mkl
blas                      1.0                         mkl  
mkl                       2019.0                      118  
mkl_fft                   1.0.6            py36h7dd41cf_0  
mkl_random                1.0.1            py36h4414c95_1

and this is the one for 0.4.1

$ conda list | grep -i pytorch
cuda90                    1.0                  h6433d27_0    pytorch
pytorch                   0.4.1           py36_cuda9.0.176_cudnn7.1.2_1    pytorch
torchvision               0.2.1                    py36_1    pytorch

$ conda list | grep -i mkl
mkl                       2018.0.1             h19d6760_4  
mkl-service               1.1.2            py36h17a0993_4

Yes, I've installed only through conda (both 0.4.1 and 1.0.0.dev20181113 in different environments).
Below are my MKL versions according to conda for the nightly environment:
$ conda list | grep pytorch
pytorch-nightly           1.0.0.dev20181113 py3.6_cuda9.0.176_cudnn7.1.2_0    pytorch

blas                      1.0                         mkl

mkl_random                1.0.1            py36h4414c95_1  

and this is the one for 0.4.1

mkl                       2018.0.1             h19d6760_4  
mkl-service               1.1.2            py36h17a0993_4
body:
Yes, I've installed only through conda (both 0.4.1 and 1.0.0.dev20181113 in different environments). 

Below are my MKL versions according to conda for the nightly environment:

```
$ conda list | grep pytorch
pytorch-nightly           1.0.0.dev20181113 py3.6_cuda9.0.176_cudnn7.1.2_0    pytorch

$ conda list | grep -i mkl
blas                      1.0                         mkl  
mkl                       2019.0                      118  
mkl_fft                   1.0.6            py36h7dd41cf_0  
mkl_random                1.0.1            py36h4414c95_1  
```

and this is the one for 0.4.1

```
$ conda list | grep -i pytorch
cuda90                    1.0                  h6433d27_0    pytorch
pytorch                   0.4.1           py36_cuda9.0.176_cudnn7.1.2_1    pytorch
torchvision               0.2.1                    py36_1    pytorch

$ conda list | grep -i mkl
mkl                       2018.0.1             h19d6760_4  
mkl-service               1.1.2            py36h17a0993_4  
```
